title: Drawing, "Moulin Huet Bay, Guernsey, Channel Islands, Great Britain", 1897
medium: Brush and watercolor, traces of graphite on off white wove paper
signed: Signed and dated in  brush ? and wash, lower right: Wm T. Richards, 97
provenance:
Gift of the National Academy of Design, New York, New York
Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest to the National Design Museum
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Horizontal view from beach looking toward the sea, with steep cliffs at left receding into the distance. Waves lap against boulder at lower right and onto small stretch of beach at lower left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Moulin Huet Bay, Guernsey, Channel Islands, Great Britain", 1897.
1897. Brush and watercolor, traces of graphite on off white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-77.
